title: Luxury Mincemeat Biscuits
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) butter', '300g (11 oz) caster sugar', '3 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '400g (14 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '125g (4 1/2 oz) chopped walnuts', '425g (15 oz) prepared mincemeat, drained']
